sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the High-Speed Railway  Commission Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the High-Speed Railway Commission Act.

sections.heading: Duties of Commission. The High-Speed Railway Commission shall create a statewide plan for a high-speed rail line and feeder network connecting St
sections.text: Louis, Missouri and Chicago, Illinois that includes current existing Amtrak and Metra services, connects the cities of Rockford, Moline, Peoria, and Deca

sections.heading: Administrative support. The Department of Transportation shall provide administrative and other support to the Commission.
sections.text: Administrative support. The Department of Transportation shall provide administrative and other support to the Commission.

sections.heading: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
